sqlReaderQuery.value:
------Creating Data ---------------
WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT 
	category='Renewed', 
	B.NewMembers AS AccountID  , 
	B.DateStart as MonthDate, 

     CASE 
	 WHEN A.MemberGrade__c  IS NULL 
	  Then (select  C.Grade__c from [salesforce].[Contract] C  where C.accountid =B.NewMembers and c.currentmembership__c =1)
	  Else A.MemberGrade__c 
	 END 
	 AS [MemberGrade], 

      CASE 
	  WHEN A.BillingGrade__c  IS NULL 
		THEN   (select  C.MemberBillingGrade__c from [salesforce].[Contract] C  where C.accountid =B.NewMembers and c.currentmembership__c =1)
		WHEN A.BillingGrade__c IN ( '14 - Student - PYear' ,  '14 – Student – PYear' , '16 - Student - PYear',  '17 - Student - PYear' , '18 - Student - PYear' ) 
		Then  '14 - Student - PYear'         
	  ELSE  A.BillingGrade__c 
		END 
		AS [BillingGrade], 

        
		CASE            
		when A.branch__c ='Canberra'  then  'CANB'          
		when A.branch__c ='New South Wales'  then  'NSW'          
		when A.branch__c ='Northern Territory' then  'NT'          
		when A.branch__c ='Overseas' then  'os'          
		when A.branch__c IN  ('Queensland' , 'South Pacific Overseas')  then  'QLD'          
		when A.branch__c ='South Australia' then  'SA'          
		when A.branch__c ='Tasmania' then  'TAS'          
		when A.branch__c ='Victoria' then  'VIC'          
		when A.branch__c ='Western Australia' then  'WA'          
		when A.branch__C is NULL and HiddenUserLocationState__c ='Overseas' then 'os'          
		ELSE null          
       END as [BranchGroup]  , 
		
		CASE           
		When A.Gender__c in ('F', 'Female' )  or  A.Title__c  in ('Miss', 'Mrs', 'Ms')  Then 'Female'          
		When A.Gender__c in ('MALE', 'M')  or  A.Title__c  in ('Mr.', 'Sir', 'Ms')   then 'Male'          
		When A.Gender__c is NULL then (select DISTINCT(c.Applicant_Title__c) from  [dbo].[assessment] c  where B.NewMembers = c.applicantname__C  )          
		else A.Gender__c          
		end as [Gender]    , 

				
		CASE          
		when  CertificationLevel__c in ('CP','CP Lapsed') then 'CP'          
		when CertificationLevel__c in ('CT','CT Lapsed') then 'CT'          
		when CertificationLevel__c in ('Not Certified') then 'Not Certified'          
		else NULL          
		end as [certificationGroup],
		
		CertificationLevel__c as  [CertificationLevel] ,           
		 A.PPP__c as PPP ,              
		 A.id as [AccountObjID],           
		 A.email__c as [Email],           
		 A.type as [AccountType],          
		 A.MembershipNumber__c as [MembershipNumber],    
		 A.DateOfBirth__c, 
		A.Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c, 
		A.HiddenFullName__c as [PersonFullName],          
		A.CurrentMembershipExpiry__c as [CurrentMembershipExpiry],          
		A.PersonAccountJoinedDate__c as [JoinedDate],  
		A.branch__c as [Branch],           
		A.Geography__c as [Geography],           
		A.[ShippingCountry] as [WorkCountry],           
		A.[BillingCountry] as [HomeCountry],           
		A.Former_Billing_Grade1__c  ,           

	   CASE 
	   WHEN A.Membership_Status__c  IS NULL 
	   Then (select  C.Status from [salesforce].[Contract] C  where C.accountid =B.NewMembers and c.currentmembership__c =1)
	   ELSE A.Membership_Status__c
	   END as Membership_Status,       
		
	    CASE           
		When A.BillingGrade__c in ('0 - n/a', '1 - Continuing' , '12 - Complimentary','13 - Honoured', '16 - Unemployed / On Hiatus', '5 - Life Member')   Then 'Other'          
		When A.BillingGrade__c in ('10 - Student - PPP', '11 - Student', '15 - Student - ACSF', '15 – Student – ACSF')   then 'Student'          
		When A.BillingGrade__c in ('14 - Student - PYear', '14 – Student – PYear', '16 - Student - PYear', '17 - Student - PYear', '18 - Student - PYear') then 'Professional Year'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('17 - PPP MOU2', '2 - PPP Full fee') then 'PPP'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('19 - Subscriber - PPP') then 'Subscriber'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('20 - Skills Applicant') then 'Overseas'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('7 - Graduate - 2nd Year') then 'Graduate'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('3 - Full Fee') then 'Full Fee'          
		When  A.BillingGrade__c in ('8 - Retired') then 'Retired'          
		else NULL           
		end as [BGG], 


		CONCAT(A.BillingGrade__c, '_',A.Former_Billing_Grade1__c) as BillingGradeConcat ,  

		CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0)) AS ExtractDate,          
		LEFT(DATENAME(MONTH, GETDATE()), 3) + '-' + RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), YEAR(GETDATE())), 2) AS [FYYear],          

	    CASE
		WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0))  between '2024-07-01' and '2025-06-30'
		THEN 'FY 25'
		WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(month, DATEDIFF(month, 0, GETDATE()), 0))  between '2023-07-01' and '2024-06-30'
		THEN 'FY 24'
		 ELSE NULL 
		END 
		as [FY],	
		
		LEFT(LEFT(DATENAME(MONTH, GETDATE()), 3) + '-' + RIGHT(CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), YEAR(GETDATE())), 2),3)   AS [Month]   
	  	  
		  --update the Function here 
	      	FROM  [membership].[members_renew12months_A](@{pipeline().parameters.Month}) B
			INNER JOIN [salesforce].[Account] A 
			ON B.NewMembers = A.id
)
,
-----Updating the Billing Grade Values -------

CTE1 
AS
(
select category,
AccountID,
MonthDate,
[MemberGrade]	,
BranchGroup,	
Gender	,
certificationGroup	,
CertificationLevel,
[PPP],
AccountObjID,
[Email]	,
AccountType	,
MembershipNumber	DateOfBirth__c	,
Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c,
PersonFullName	,
CurrentMembershipExpiry	,
JoinedDate	,
Branch	,
Geography,
WorkCountry,
HomeCountry	,
Former_Billing_Grade1__c	,
Membership_Status,
BGG	,
BillingGradeConcat,
ExtractDate	,
[FYYear]	,
FY	,
Month, 
--Updating Billing Grade based on Previous Billing Grades 
CASE     
   WHEN   Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30  and billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee_2 - PPP Full fee' 
   Then  '2 - PPP Full fee'    
   WHEN Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and  billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee_1 - Continuing'
   Then   '1 - Continuing'    
   WHEN Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and  billinggradeconcat ='7 - Graduate - 2nd Year_4 - Graduate - 1st Year' 
   Then    '4 - Graduate - 1st Year'    
   WHEN   Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and   billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee_7 - Graduate - 2nd Year' 
   Then   '7 - Graduate - 2nd Year'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='4 - Graduate - 1st Year_10 - Student - PPP' 
   Then  '10 - Student - PPP'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='4 - Graduate - 1st Year_11 - Student' 
   Then   '11 - Student'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and   billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee_12 - Complimentary' 
   Then  '12 - Complimentary'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee 13 - Honoured' 
   Then  '13 - Honoured'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and   billinggradeconcat ='4 - Graduate - 1st Year_14 - Student - PYear'  
   Then  '14 - Student - PYear'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='4 - Graduate - 1st Year_15 - Student - ACSF' 
   Then   '15 - Student - ACSF'    
   WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='3 - Full Fee_16 - Unemployed / On Hiatus' 
   Then  '16 - Unemployed / On Hiatus'    
  WHEN  Former_Billing_Grade1__c  IS  NOT NULL  and Days_since_Current_Membership_Expiry__c   >= -30 and    billinggradeconcat ='18 - Digital Subscriber 20 - Skills Applicant' 
  Then  '20 - Skills Applicant'    
  ELSE [BillingGrade]
   END    
   AS [BillingGrade]


from CTE

)

, 

-----Transofromation Heirarchy & Subsegment  --------------------
CTE2 AS (
    SELECT 
        CTE1.*, 
        CASE    
            WHEN [MemberGrade] IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow')
			THEN 'Professional'    

            WHEN [MemberGrade] IN ( 'Associate' )
			 AND 
			[BillingGrade] IN (    
                '1 - Continuing', 
				'3 - Full Fee', 
				'5 - Life Member',    
                '2 - PPP Full Fee',
				'3 - Full Fee',
				'17 - PPP MOU2',    
                '8 - Retired'  
            ) THEN 'Full Fee Associates'    

            WHEN ( [MemberGrade] NOT IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow', 'Subscriber', 'Honorary Member')    OR  [MemberGrade] in ('Associate') )
                AND [BillingGrade] IN (    
                    '4 - Graduate - 1st Year', 
					'7 - Graduate - 2nd Year',    
                    '10 - Student - PPP',
					'11 - Student',    
                    '15 - Student - ACSF',
					'16 - Unemployed / On Hiatus'    
                ) THEN 'Discounted (Full Benefits)'    

            WHEN  ( [MemberGrade] NOT IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow', 'Subscriber', 'Honorary Member')   OR  [MemberGrade] in ('Associate') )
                AND [BillingGrade]
				IN ('20 - Skills Applicant') 
				THEN 'Skills Applicants'  

            WHEN  ( [MemberGrade] NOT IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow', 'Subscriber') OR  [MemberGrade] in ('Associate', 'Honorary Member') )
			                AND [BillingGrade] IN 
							('11 - Complimentary', 
							'12 - Complimentary', 
							'13 - Honoured')
							THEN 'Complimentary (Full Benefits)'  

            WHEN  ( [MemberGrade] NOT IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow', 'Subscriber', 'Honorary Member')  OR  [MemberGrade] in ('Associate') )
                AND [BillingGrade] IN 
				('14 - Student - PYear') 
				THEN 'Professional Year'  

            WHEN  ([MemberGrade] NOT IN ('Member', 'Senior Member', 'Fellow', 'Honorary Fellow', 'Subscriber', 'Honorary Member')   OR  [MemberGrade] in ('Associate', 'Subscriber'))
                AND [BillingGrade] IN (
                    '18 - Digital Subscriber',
					'19 - Subscriber - PPP', 
					'18 - Subscriber - PPP'    
                ) THEN 'Subscribers (Discounted Limited Benefits)'
            ELSE NULL -- Set Heirarchy to NULL if none of the conditions are met
        END AS Heirarchy
    FROM CTE1
), 
CTE3
As (

SELECT *, 
    CASE  
	--Professinal Segments
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Professional'
		AND
		[BillingGrade] NOT IN ('5 - Life Member', 
		'13 - Honoured', 
		'1 - Continuing', 
		'8 - Retired', 
		'3 - Full Fee',
		'2 - PPP Full Fee',
		'17 - PPP MOU2', 
		'16 - PPP MOU2') 
		THEN 'Member, Senior Member, Fellow'  
   
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Professional' 
		AND
		[BillingGrade] 
		IN 
		('5 - Life Member', 
		'13 - Honoured', 
		'1 - Continuing') 
		THEN 'Life Members, Hon Members'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Professional'
		AND
		[BillingGrade] = '3 - Full Fee' 
		THEN 'Full Fee (Individual)'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Professional'
		AND
		[BillingGrade] IN (
		'2 - PPP Full Fee', 
		'17 - PPP MOU2', 
		'16 - PPP MOU2')
		THEN 'Full Fee (PPP)'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] IN ( 'Professional', 'Full Fee Associates')
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] = '8 - Retired' 
		THEN 'Retired'        
  
      --Full Fee Segments      
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Full Fee Associates' 
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] 
		IN ('3 - Full Fee',
		'5 - Life Member',
		'1 - Continuing') 
		THEN 'Full Fee Associates (Individual)'  
		
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Full Fee Associates' 
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] 
		IN ('2 - PPP Full Fee',
		'17 - PPP MOU2', 
		'16 - PPP MOU2')
		THEN 'Full Fee Associates (PPP)'        

            

	   --Discounted 
              
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Discounted (Full Benefits)'
		AND
		[BillingGrade] IN
		('10 - Student - PPP',
		'11 - Student', 
		'15 - Student - ACSF') 
		THEN 'Students'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Discounted (Full Benefits)'
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] 
		IN ('4 - Graduate - 1st Year',
		'7 - Graduate - 2nd Year')
		THEN 'Graduate'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Discounted (Full Benefits)' 
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] = '16 - Unemployed / On Hiatus' 
		THEN 'Unemployed'   
 
 --Subscriber
            
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Subscribers (Discounted Limited Benefits)'
		AND 
		[BillingGrade] NOT IN
		('19 - Subscriber - PPP',
		'18 - Subscriber - PPP') 
		THEN 'Individuals'     
		
        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Subscribers (Discounted Limited Benefits)'
		AND
		[BillingGrade] IN
		('19 - Subscriber - PPP', 
		'18 - Subscriber - PPP')
		THEN 'PPP'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Professional Year'
		THEN 'Professional Year'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Complimentary (Full Benefits)' 
		THEN 'Complimentary'        

        WHEN [Heirarchy] = 'Skills Applicants'
		THEN 'Skills Applicants'        

		  WHEN [BGG] = 'Overseas' AND [Heirarchy] != 'Professional' 
		  THEN 'Skills Applicants'  

    END as subsegments
FROM CTE2)


select * from CTE3
